title: The Most Annoying things about League of legends

embed.description: ■ Twitter- https://twitter.com/gpoddler ■ Subscribe and Eat Oranges ► bit.ly/1TeOLQB Random ass video ► https://youtu.be/1FKrwVngfRc Outro: Lazslo-Intestellar(Outskirts Remix) note: clearly this is all my opinion so yeah theres that. So please enjoy my rendition of the most annoying things in league of legends.

body: Just a couple of things annoying about league

replies.body: when their shitty game doesnt reconnect and you get a leaver/blamed for it :^) {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
Most annoying thing that happens for me are getting a good start to the game then throwing the game in late game.{{sticker:sg-syndra}}
